name: Cookable
body:
### Welcome to Cookable.
Cookable helps you cook in an efficient, easy, and enjoyable way. You can find recipes with desired ingredients, order needed ingredients for a recipe, and cook a recipe with detailed instructions.

### Reports

[Contextual Inquiry](https://docs.google.com/a/cornell.edu/document/d/1sdN7gYqnsLQ2rIVAttqFfdarfxXztsPPm32j9xv7KP4/edit)

[Task Analysis](https://docs.google.com/a/cornell.edu/document/d/1gCMu0Pm5MIMwwEeLafyqnyYR-kubhHuw89clBzjqaLg/edit)

[Concept Video](https://docs.google.com/a/cornell.edu/document/d/1EU2lnE0D5UXIApHQt1lkEgx30ZdRYXCxZjpyOGST3KE/edit)

[Lo-fi Prototyping](https://docs.google.com/a/cornell.edu/document/d/1A0tf3uV23dvQVNu4JuJVk1bg_Ntfz0jJyLpRY0T5nQI/edit)

[Med-fi Prototype](https://docs.google.com/a/cornell.edu/document/d/1IbZhTXo1_RWeSg_TLSXvhZuoq-cgoViaK3ndobAptWI/edit)

[Hi-fi Prototype](https://docs.google.com/a/cornell.edu/document/d/1h33ODjIVkOh3KBt9B-fNm0J8g3RVhRi-WBbEGB-zo4E/edit)

[Field Usability Study](https://docs.google.com/a/cornell.edu/document/d/1OYwuECw63Jr4MyYO9v2rl1pSo29FUPljTnUqgY6nLP8/edit)

[https://docs.google.com/a/cornell.edu/document/d/1nwB0g_9VP8IitLfz1cknTg3UgCrfGz_S6aPfA_wl7pg/edit](Interactive Prototype #2)

### Try the prototype

Download the prototype by clicking a link on the right. After unzipping the file, you can run the prototype by opening Cookable.xcodeproj in Xcode, and running the simulator.

### Team
Cookable is a project by Alex Wolff (@AlexWolff90), Kevin Luo (@kluo), and Kwadwo Nyarko (@kwadwon) for [INFO6410](https://teaching.tech.cornell.edu/courses/info6410/14sp/index.html).
